title: Adelaide Confused
description: St. Simons is a small island town, though with the recent stabbing and subsequent murder, more is going on than meets the eye. And Adelaide Graves, being an empath, is in a position to do something about it. While running around town with the unnaturally charming and rich Reed Wallace, attending parties and picnics, sheâ€™ll try to feel out who is guilty, rushing to discover the murderer before he makes his next move.
author: Penny Greenhorn
